column2: However,  it  seems that the  learned Trial Judge  has  rejected the  Dock Statement
on  the  basis  that  it  relates  to  a  separate  incident.  This  Court  finds  that  such  a
conclusion  is  unsubstantiated  and  a  wrong  finding  of fact  especially  since  the

column1: Appellant  was  giving  his  version  of the  incident  he  has  been  charged  with  and

column2: also  since the Appellant could not have referred to  any other incident other than
